div.p: Mapping from CH VACD Snomed CT for vaccine code to CH VACD Swissmedic code for vaccine code

DRAFT. Published on 2024-05-16 11:02:13+0000 by HL7 Switzerland (HL7 Switzerland: https://www.hl7.ch/, HL7 Switzerland: https://www.hl7.ch/).
